misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a familiar and formidable figure at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the competition. Representing Hirsala Golf, Toni is known not only for his skill on the course but also for his pivotal role as the primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event. His dedication to the tournament is evident both in his organizational efforts and in his consistent participation.

With 11 past appearances and a proud record of 3 Hector Trophée victories, Toni has proven himself a force to be reckoned with in pair competitions. Additionally, his 2 Victor Trophy titles underscore his individual prowess. He is a strategic player known for his calm demeanor under pressure.

As Toni prepares for his 12th appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds around his performance. Spectators and fellow competitors alike are keen to see how his blend of experience, skill, and deep understanding of the game will play out on the course. Toni's continued presence ensures that the spirit of the competition remains strong, making him a true cornerstone of the Hector Trophée.
